text: (dutare,) ‘‘avanu (allahanu) savistaravada granthavannu nim'medege ilisikottiruvaga, nanenu allahanannu bittu tirpugaranagi berobbanannu hudukabeke?’’ Endu keliri. Navu yarige granthavannu nidiruvevo avarige, adu (kur‌an) nim'modeyana kadeyinda, satyadondige ilisalagiruva granthavendu khacitavagi tilidide. Niviga sansayisuvavara salige serabedi
